alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 5:55AM AKST until December 12 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...A strong warm front will produce impactful snow over the northeast Gulf Coast and portions of the northern Panhandle through Monday night. Low level warm air will move in behind this front and this will result in a transition from snow to rain or a rain/snow mix from Monday afternoon through Monday night... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches near Haines. Total accumulations of 5 to 7 inches in and near Juneau. Higher amounts possible in the Mendenhall Valley. * WHERE...Haines Borough, Klukwan, and City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to transition to rain in the Juneau area by Monday evening and become heavy at times. This will seriously complicate snow removal efforts. Haines should remain as snow for the duration of the event.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Plan ahead for difficult snow removal conditions. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Haines Borough and Klukwan
